title: The One With All The Wedding Dresses

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Joey when he starts snoring again?
options: Oh. Oh, did-did-did I wake you?
You have to go to a sleep clinic!
I'm going to roll you over!
questions.correct_answer: You have to go to a sleep clinic!
questions.explanation: Chandler tells Joey that he needs to go to a sleep clinic because of his loud snoring.

topic.title: The One With All The Wedding Dresses

questions.question: What is Monica's reaction when she tries on Emily's wedding dress?
options: She feels like a beautiful bride
questions.correct_answer: She feels like a beautiful bride
questions.explanation: Monica tries on Emily's wedding dress and feels like a beautiful bride, even pretending to thank guests at her own wedding.

topic.title: The One With All The Wedding Dresses

questions.question: Why does Ross want to have dinner with Rachel, Joshua, and Emily?
options: So the four of them can hang out together
questions.correct_answer: So the four of them can hang out together
questions.explanation: Ross wants to have dinner with the four of them so they can all spend time together.

topic.title: The One With All The Wedding Dresses

questions.question: What is Rachel's initial reaction to Ross's engagement?
options: She's upset and feels like she's lost him
She's surprised but okay with it
questions.correct_answer: She's surprised but okay with it
questions.explanation: Rachel tells Ross that she's okay with his engagement, but later reveals that she's not handling it well.

topic.title: The One With All The Wedding Dresses

questions.question: What does Joey discover at the sleep clinic?
options: That he talks in his sleep
That he needs to wear a mouth guard to stop snoring
questions.correct_answer: That he needs to wear a mouth guard to stop snoring
questions.explanation: Joey is given a mouth guard at the sleep clinic to help him stop snoring.

topic.title: The One With All The Wedding Dresses

questions.question: Why does Rachel ask Joshua to marry her?
options: Because she wants to get married before Ross does
Because she thinks they're a great couple
Because she wants to prove a point to Ross
questions.correct_answer: Because she thinks they're a great couple and wants to be crazy in love
questions.explanation: Rachel asks Joshua to marry her because she thinks they have a great connection and wants to be crazy in love.

topic.title: The One With All The Wedding Dresses

questions.question: What is the outcome of Rachel's conversation with Joshua?
options: He tells her he's not ready for marriage
He needs time to think about it
questions.correct_answer: He breaks up with her
questions.explanation: Joshua breaks up with Rachel, telling her that his divorce isn't final and they've only been on four dates.

topic.title: The One With All The Wedding Dresses

questions.question: What do the girls do to cheer Rachel up after her breakup?
options: They try on wedding dresses and eat popcorn
questions.correct_answer: They try on wedding dresses and eat popcorn
questions.explanation: The girls try on wedding dresses, eat popcorn, and watch TV to cheer Rachel up after her breakup.

topic.title: The One With All The Wedding Dresses

questions.question: What is Marjorie's condition that she's being treated for at the sleep clinic?
questions.correct_answer: Talking in her sleep
questions.explanation: Marjorie is at the sleep clinic because she talks in her sleep.

topic.title: The One With All The Wedding Dresses

questions.question: Why does Ross think getting married in a month is a good idea?
options: Because Emily wants to get married quickly
Because the venue they want is being torn down
Because they've been together for a long time
questions.correct_answer: Because the venue they want is being torn down
questions.explanation: Ross thinks getting married in a month is a good idea because the venue they want is being torn down and Emily's parents got married there.

options: She joins in and tries on a wedding dress too

questions.explanation: Phoebe joins in and tries on a wedding dress, and they both pretend to be brides.

questions.question: What does Joey say when he's introduced to Marjorie at the sleep clinic?
options: So why don't you give me your number?
questions.correct_answer: So why don't you give me your number?
questions.explanation: Joey, while asleep, tells Marjorie to give him her number.

questions.correct_answer: He screams with her

questions.question: Why does Rachel feel sad about Ross's engagement?

Because she thinks they rushed into it
Because she's not invited to the wedding

questions.explanation: Rachel feels sad about Ross's engagement because she realizes she still has feelings for him.

questions.question: What does Monica say when she's pretending to be a bride in Emily's wedding dress?

questions.question: What does Ross say to Rachel when she's feeling down about his engagement?
questions.correct_answer: Come here

questions.question: What do the girls do when they hear someone knocking on the door while they're wearing wedding dresses?
questions.correct_answer: They try to hide and avoid answering the door
